Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local connection
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool.Enabled = true
local lastAttack = 0
local runService = game:service("RunService")
local damage = 17
local swordSound
local dashTime = 0 local lastKeyDown = 0
local amAnimating = false
local slashAnim
function charge(key) if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end if key:lower() == "w" then local t = runService.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastKeyDown < 0.2) then dashTime = t end lastKeyDown = t end end
function lunge(humanoid, torso) local holdAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.DashAnim) if holdAnim then holdAnim:Play() else Tool.Enabled = true return end local target = humanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - torso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) local newBV = nil if direction.magnitude > .01 then direction = direction.unit newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.P = 100000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, 0, newBV.P) newBV.velocity = direction * 50 newBV.Parent = torso torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(torso.Position, target * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) + Vector3.new(0, torso.Position.Y, 0)) end wait(.75) if newBV ~= nil then newBV:remove() end wait(.5) end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function blow(hit) if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil or vCharacter == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid~=nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then local rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then local rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip and (rightGrip.Part0 == Sword or rightGrip.Part1 == Sword) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(17) if hit.Parent.Name == "Zombie" and myHumanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(85) if humanoid and humanoid.Health == 0 then if myHumanoid.MaxHealth < 250 then myHumanoid.MaxHealth = myHumanoid.MaxHealth + 10 myHumanoid.Health = myHumanoid.Health + 10 end end end if myHumanoid and myHumanoid.Health + 2 < myHumanoid.MaxHealth then myHumanoid.Health = myHumanoid.Health + 2 end end end end end
function swordUp() Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function swordOut() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0) end
function attack() damage = slashDamage local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") anim.Name = "toolanim" anim.Value = "Slash" anim.Parent = Tool end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local t = runService.Stepped:wait() if (t - dashTime < 0.2) then print("Dashing") swordSound = Sword:FindFirstChild("SwordSound") if swordSound then swordSound:Play() end lunge(myHumanoid, myTorso) else slashAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SlashAnim) if slashAnim then slashAnim:Play() end end --lastAttack = t
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 20.0 end if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(charge) end end
function onUnequipped() -- do nothing if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end if holdAnim then holdAnim:Stop() end if swordSound then swordSound:Stop() end
if slashAnim then slashAnim:Stop() end
swordUp() end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
connection = Sword.Touched:connect(blow)
